d: Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite, gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.

cd: BAMPH!
d: BAMPH!
If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill and all skills of the same attribute are disabled for %s0..%s15 seconds and that skill is interrupted.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Reduces fire damage you take by %s0..%s15%. You gain 2 Energy when you take fire damage.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever you take fire damage, the damage is reduced by %s0..%s15% and you gain 2 Energy.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Reduces cold damage you take by %s0..%s15%. You gain 2 Energy when you take cold damage.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever you take cold damage, the damage is reduced by %s0..%s15% and you gain 2 Energy.

d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever you take lightning damage, the damage is reduced by %s0..%s15% and you gain 2 Energy.

d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, your Fast Casting attribute increases by 50%. Whenever you cast a spell, you lose 3 Energy or Mantra of Celerity ends.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Your spells recharge 33% faster.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, spells you cast recharge 33% faster.

d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, signets you successfully activate while in this stance recharge %s0..%s15% faster.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) The next time you would be interrupted, you are not interrupted.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, the next time you would be interrupted, you are not interrupted.

d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, you have +3 armor for each signet you have equipped. Whenever you use a signet, you gain %b0..%b15 Health.

d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target and adjacent foes take %s0..%s15 damage each time they suffer or recover from a new condition.

cd: NULL
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe's attacks may damage any character in range, including the target.

d: Remove an enchantment from target foe and gain %s0..%s15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.

d: Remove a hex from target ally and gain %s0..%s15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.

cd: Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: deals %s0..%s15 damage.
d: If target foe is casting a spell or a chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe takes %s0..%s15 damage.

cd: Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: causes %s0..%s15 Energy loss.
d: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe loses %s0..%s15 Energy.

cd: Interrupts a spell or chant. Interruption effect: you gain %s0..%s15 Energy.
d: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and you gain %s0..%s15 Energy.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe's attacks deal %b0..%b15 less damage, and that foe takes %s0..%s15 damage with each attack.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes %s0..%s15 damage and deals %b0..%b15 less damage.

d: Remove one Mesmer hex from target foe. If a hex is removed, that foe and all adjacent foes take %s0..%s15 damage.

cd: (10 seconds.) Target foe takes %s0..%s15 damage whenever it casts a spell.
d: For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe takes %s0..%s15 damage.

cd: (%s0..%s15 seconds.) Disables skills. *Your skills are disabled (5 seconds).*
d: For %s0..%s15 seconds, all of touched target foe's skills are disabled, and all of your skills are disabled for 5 seconds.

cd: (6 seconds.) Target foe's next skill takes +%s0..%s15 seconds to recharge.
d: For 6 seconds, the next time target foe uses a skill, that skill takes an additional %s0..%s15 seconds to recharge.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Causes -5 Health degeneration.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe experiences -5 Health degeneration.

cd: Lose %s0..%s15 Health. End effect: you gain %s0..%s15 Health. *Ends if damage drops your Health below 25% of your maximum.*
d: You lose %s0..%s15 Health. Illusion of Weakness ends if damage drops your Health below 25% of your maximum. When Illusion of Weakness ends, you gain %s0..%s15 Health.

cd: (30 seconds.) Deals %s0..%s15 damage to foes in place of other damage or effects from melee attacks. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill. *Your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit.*
d: For 30 seconds, your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit. Instead, Illusionary Weaponry deals %s0..%s15 damage to your targets for each melee attack. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) All adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy whenever a melee attack hits target ally.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack, all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe cannot use signets.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds target foe cannot use signets.

cd: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (%d0..%d15 seconds). Doubles spell casting time. End effect: you gain %b0..%b15 energy.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, spells cast by target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to cast. When this hex ends, you gain %b0..%b15 energy.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You move 33% faster. Initial effect: removes Crippled condition. *End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds you are no longer Crippled, and you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy for each foe in the area whenever you cast a spell.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for each foe in the area.

cd: Causes %s0..%s15 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage to target and nearby foes for each point of Energy lost.
d: Target foe loses %s0..%s15 Energy. For each point of Energy lost, that foe and all nearby foes take 9 damage.

cd: Causes 3 Energy loss. You gain %b0..%b15 Health for each point of Energy lost.
d: Target foe loses 3 Energy. You are healed %b0..%b15 for each point of Energy lost.

cd: *You lose all Energy.* Target foe has -%s0..%s15 Energy degeneration and you have +%s0..%s15 Energy regeneration (%d0..%d15 seconds).
d: You lose all Energy. For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe suffers -%s0..%s15 Energy degeneration, and you experience +%s0..%s15 Energy regeneration.

cd: Causes %s0..%s15 Energy loss. Deals 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.
d: Target foe loses %s0..%s15 Energy and takes 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

cd: (4 seconds.) Also hexes adjacent foes. Interrupts next attack. Interruption effect: deals %s0..%s15 damage.
d: For 4 seconds, target and adjacent foes are hexed with Clumsiness. The next time each foe attacks, the attack is interrupted and that foe suffers %s0..%s15 damage.

d: For 10 seconds, target foe suffers -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration. When Phantom Pain ends, that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: (10 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower. End effect: you gain %b0..%b15 Energy.
d: For 10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When Ethereal Burden ends, you gain %b0..%b15 Energy.

cd: (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal %s0..%s15 Energy. *No effect unless this foe's spell targets one of your allies.*
d: For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets a foe, the spell fails and you steal up to %s0..%s15 Energy from that foe.

d: For 4 seconds, the next time the target foe or any adjacent foe attacks, they take %s0..%s15 damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.

cd: (30 seconds.) Target foe has 25% chance to miss. You gain %b0..%b15 Energy whenever this foe misses.
d: For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks. You gain %b0..%b15 Energy whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Causes 1 Energy loss each time foe is the target of your non-hex Mesmer skills. Deals %b0..%b15 damage per point of Energy lost. If target foe's Energy drops to 0, it takes %s0..%s15 damage and Mind Wrack ends.

cd: (3 seconds.) End effect: causes %s0..%s15 damage to target and adjacent foes. *No effect and ends early if target foe uses a skill.*

cd: (6 seconds.) Target foe's next spell fails and you steal %s0..%s15 Energy. *No effect unless this foe's spell targeted one of its allies.*
d: For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally, the spell fails and you steal up to %s0..%s15 Energy from that foe.

cd: Also hexes foes near your target (%d0..%d15 seconds). Interrupts all other nearby foes whenever a hexed foe successfully activates a skill.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Panic. When a foe hexed with Panic successfully uses a skill, all other nearby foes are interrupted.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Causes -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration and doubles skill activation time.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe suffers -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration and takes 100% longer to activate skills.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe moves and attacks 50% slower and has -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target moves and attacks 50% slower and suffers -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Foes in the area also have any new conditions that target foe acquires. Inflicts Dazed on target foe (%b0..%b15 seconds) if that foe has two or more conditions.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever target foe suffers from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that condition as well. If target foe has two or more conditions, that foe is Dazed for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: Also hexes foes adjacent to target (%d0..%d15 seconds). These foes cannot gain adrenaline.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes cannot gain adrenaline.

cd: If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and take %s0..%s15 damage.
d: If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and suffer %s0..%s15 damage.

cd: (15 seconds.) Inflicts Blindness condition. *You suffer from Blindness (15 seconds).*
d: You and target touched foe become Blinded for 15 seconds.

cd: Also affects foes near your target. Causes %s0..%s15 Energy loss and inflicts Weakness (%b0..%b15 seconds).
d: Target foe and all nearby foes lose %s0..%s15 Energy and suffer from Weakness for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) The next spell you cast uses Illusion Magic instead of its normal attribute.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, the next spell you cast uses Illusion Magic as its attribute.

cd: Interrupts an action. Interruption effect: you gain %s0..%s15 Energy if the action was a spell.
d: Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you gain %s0..%s15 Energy.

cd: Disables elite skill (%s0..%s15 seconds). *Disables your non-Mesmer skills (10 seconds).*
d: Target foe's elite skill is disabled for %s0..%s15 seconds. Your non-Mesmer skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

d: All of your signets except Keystone Signet are recharged. For 20 seconds, the next %b0..%b15 times you use a signet that targets a foe, all other foes adjacent to your target take %s0..%s15 damage and are interrupted.

cd: (20 seconds.) This skill is replaced with the last skill used by this ally. *Ends after one use.*

cd: This skill becomes target ally's elite skill (20 seconds). *Cannot self-target. No effect if target's elite skill is a form.*
d: For 20 seconds, Arcane Mimicry becomes the non-form elite skill from target other ally.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe loses 5 Energy whenever it attacks.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe loses 5 Energy whenever that foe attacks.

cd: Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals %s0..%s15 damage to foes near this ally.
d: Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes near that ally take %s0..%s15 damage.

cd: Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: you gain %s0..%s15 Energy and %b0..%b15 Health.
d: Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you gain %s0..%s15 Energy and %b0..%b15 Health.

cd: Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: deals %s0..%s15 damage.
d: Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, that foe takes %s0..%s15 damage.

cd: (10 seconds.) You disappear.
d: You disappear for 10 seconds.

cd: Removes the most recent nature ritual. *Your skills are disabled (%d0..%d15 seconds).
d: Remove the most recent nature ritual. All of your skills are disabled for %d0..%d15 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You have +40 armor against elemental damage. *You have -%b0..%b15 armor against physical damage.*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, You gain +40 armor against elemental damage, but you lose %b0..%b15 armor against physical damage.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You have +40 armor against physical damage. *You have -%b0..%b15 armor against elemental damage.*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, You gain +40 armor against physical damage, but you lose %b0..%b15 armor against elemental damage.

cd: (30 seconds.) Echo becomes the next skill you use (30 seconds).
d: For 30 seconds, Echo is replaced with the next skill you use. Echo acts as this skill for 30 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe moves 50% slower.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower.

cd: Deals %s0..%s15 damage and causes %b0..%b15 Energy loss each second (10 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.
d: Create a Chaos Storm at target foe's location that lasts for 10 seconds. Each second, foes adjacent to this location take %s0..%s15 damage and lose %b0..%b15 Energy.

cd: Conditions on target foe transfer to adjacent foes.
d: Spread all negative conditions and their remaining durations from target foe to all foes adjacent to your target.

cd: Causes %s0..%s15 Energy loss. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.
d: Target foe loses %s0..%s15 Energy. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

cd: Causes %s0..%s15 Energy loss. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.
d: Target foe loses %s0..%s15 Energy. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Disables one random spell. This skill becomes that spell.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe, and Arcane Thievery is replaced by that spell.

cd: (20 seconds.) End effect: you gain %s0..%s15 Energy.
d: For 20 seconds, you gain no benefit from it. You gain %s0..%s15 Energy when Mantra of Recall ends.

cd: Creates a level %s0..%s15 bone horror. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level %s0..%s15 bone horror.

cd: Creates a level %s0..%s15 bone fiend that can attack at range. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level %s0..%s15 bone fiend. Bone fiends can attack at range.

cd: Creates two level %s0..%s15 bone minions. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit nearest corpse to animate two level %s0..%s15 bone minions.

cd: You gain Health equal to half the difference between you and target, and this foe loses an equal amount. *If this foe has less Health than you, you lose half the difference and that foe gains an equal amount.*
d: If target foe has more Health than you, you gain half the difference (up to your maximum Health), and that foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you, you lose half the difference, and that foe gains an equal amount.

cd: Make target undead servant masterless. If it is already masterless, you become its master. *50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.*
d: If target hostile animated undead has a master, its bond to its master is broken, making it hostile to all other creatures. If it had no master, you become its master. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Become master of all hostile undead servants in the area. *End effect: your undead servants become masterless. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.*
d: All hostile animated undead in the area become bound to you. Verata's Aura ends after %d0..%d15 seconds. When Verata's Aura ends, you lose your bond with any undead bound to you. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

cd: Deals %s0..%s15 cold damage. Deals %b0..%b15 more damage if target foe was above 50% Health.
d: Target foe is struck for %s0..%s15 cold damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you deal an additional %b0..%b15 shadow damage.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) 10 undead allied servants gain +10 Health regeneration. Instantly recharges if you have control of 3 or fewer servants. *Transfers all conditions from those servants to you.*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, your undead allies gain +10 Health regeneration. All conditions are removed from those allies and transferred to you. If this spell is successful and you have control of 3 or fewer minions, Verata's Sacrifice instantly recharges.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Allies in this well have +%s0..%s15 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Power at that location. For %d0..%d15 seconds, allies within the area of Well of Power gain +%s0..%s15 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Allies in this well have +%s0..%s15 Health regeneration. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Blood at its location. For %d0..%d15 seconds, allies in that area receive +%s0..%s15 Health regeneration.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Foes in this well have -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Suffering at its location. For %d0..%d15 seconds, foes in that area suffer -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Foes in this well lose all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. *Exploits a fresh corpse. 50% failure chance unless Death Magic 5 or more.*
d: Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of the Profane at its location. For %d0..%d15 seconds, foes in that area are stripped of all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

cd: Explodes a corpse, dealing %s0..%s15 damage to foes near it. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: The corpse nearest your target explodes, sending out a shockwave that deals %s0..%s15 damage to nearby foes.

cd: You gain %s0..%s15 Health. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit nearest corpse to gain %s0..%s15 Health.

cd: Teleport to a corpse's location. Inflicts Poisoned condition (%s0..%s15 seconds). Affects all nearby foes. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and all nearby foes become Poisoned for %s0..%s15 seconds.

cd: Teleport to a corpse's location. You gain %s0..%s15 Health and %b0..%b15 Energy. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit a random target. You teleport to that corpse's location and gain %s0..%s15 Health and %b0..%b15 Energy.

cd: (20 seconds.) Causes -1 Health degeneration. End effect: you are healed for %b0..%b15 Health.
d: For 20 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Health degeneration. The caster is healed for %b0..%b15 when Parasitic Bond ends.

cd: (30 seconds.) Deals %s0..%s15 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on target foe.
d: For 30 seconds, target foe takes %s0..%s15 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on that target.

cd: (30 seconds.) Target foe takes %s0..%s15 damage whenever it takes physical damage.
d: For 30 seconds, target foe takes %s0..%s15 more damage when hit by physical damage.

cd: Deals %s0..%s15 damage. Steal up to %b0..%b15 Health if this foe was above 50% Health.
d: Target foe takes %s0..%s15 shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to %b0..%b15 Health.

cd: (30 seconds.) 25% chance to miss. Target foe takes %s0..%s15 damage whenever it fails to hit.
d: For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks and takes %s0..%s15 damage whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.

cd: (30 seconds.) Deals %s0..%s15 damage and inflicts Poisoned condition (15 seconds) on adjacent foes if target ally dies.
d: For 30 seconds, if target ally dies, all adjacent foes take %s0..%s15 damage and are Poisoned for 15 seconds.

cd: Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and deals %s0..%s15 cold damage. Hits two additional foes in the area.
d: Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and strikes for %s0..%s15 cold damage on up to three targets in the area.

cd: Inflicts Diseased condition (%b0..%b15 seconds).
d: Target fleshy foe becomes Diseased for %b0..%b15 seconds, slowly losing Health.

cd: Inflicts Disease, Poison, and Weakness conditions (%b0..%b15 seconds). *No effect unless this foe already had a condition.*
d: If target foe was already suffering from a condition, that foe suffers from Disease, Poison, and Weakness for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: Also hexes foes near target (%d0..%d15 seconds). These foes have -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe has -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration. You have +%s0..%s15 Health regeneration.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe suffers -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration, and you gain +%s0..%s15 Health regeneration.

cd: Steals %s0..%s15 Health from %b0..%b15 foes in the area around you.
d: Steal up to %s0..%s15 Health from up to %b0..%b15 foes in the area.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You have +2 Blood Magic and Curses. *Sacrifice 50% more Health than normal.*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, you gain +2 Blood Magic and +2 Curses, but whenever you sacrifice Health, you sacrifice 50% more than the normal amount.

cd: Deals %s0..%s15 damage to target and nearby foes. Deals %b0..%b15 more damage for each enchantment on them.
d: Target foe and all nearby foes take %s0..%s15 shadow damage and %b0..%b15 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Foes who hit target ally in melee become Diseased (%b0..%b15 seconds); this ally is immune to Disease.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target ally is immune to disease, and anyone striking that ally in melee becomes Diseased for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: Exploit all corpses in earshot. Animates a level %s0..%s15 bone horror, plus one for each exploited corpse. You have +1 Death Magic (%d0..%d15 seconds).
d: All corpses within earshot are exploited and you animate a level %s0..%s15 bone horror plus one for each corpse exploited in this way. For %d0..%d15 seconds, your Death Magic attribute is increased by +1.

cd: (7 seconds.) You have +%s0..%s15 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for %b0..%b15.

cd: Removes an enchantment from target foe. Removal effect: your next enchantment casts %s0..%s15 seconds faster and costs %b0..%b15 less Energy. (%d0..%d15 seconds)
d: Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, for the next %d0..%d15 seconds, your next enchantment spell casts %s0..%s15 seconds faster and costs %b0..%b15 less Energy.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe's attributes are 0.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, all of target foe's attributes are set to 0.

cd: (10 minutes.) Your party gains double XP from combat.
d: For 10 minutes your party gains double XP from combat.

cd: Removes target foe's enchantments. *No effect unless this foe has more than 50% Health.*
d: If target foe has more than 50% Health, that foe loses all enchantments.

cd: Your party gains triple XP from combat. *Ends if your party fails to kill a foe for 30 seconds.*
d: Your party gains triple XP from combat. Berserker's Insight ends if your party fails to kill a foe for 30 seconds.

cd: Your party gains 250% XP from combat. *Ends if your party fails to kill a boss for 5 minutes.*
d: Your party gains 250% XP from combat. Slayer's Insight ends if your party fails to kill a boss for 5 minutes.

cd: Inflict Poisoned condition (%s0..%s15 seconds) on all adjacent foes and Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.
d: All adjacent foes are Poisoned for %s0..%s15 seconds. Shadow Step to a nearby location directly away from your target.

cd: Inflicts Crippled condition (%s0..%s15 seconds) on all foes adjacent to you. You Shadow Step to target ally's location. *Cannot self-target.*
d: All adjacent foes are Crippled for %s0..%s15 seconds. Shadow Step to target other ally's location.

cd: Shadow Step to target foe. End effect: return to your original location.
d: When you cast Aura of Displacement, Shadow Step to target foe. When you stop maintaining Aura of Displacement you return to your original location.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You have +%s0..%s15 maximum Health. Drop effect: you gain %b0..%b15 Health.
d: Hold Tsungrai's ashes for up to %d0..%d15 seconds and gain +%s0..%s15 maximum Health. When you drop his ashes, you gain %b0..%b15 Health.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You have +15 armor and +30 maximum Energy.
d: Hold Vorizun's ashes for up to %d0..%d15 seconds. While you hold his ashes, you gain +15 armor and +30 maximum Energy.

cd: You do 33% more damage. *You have 33% less Health.*
d: You deal 33% more damage but have 33% less Health.

cd: Deals +%s0..%s15 damage. Also affects foes adjacent to target foe. *Must follow an off-hand attack.*
d: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Death Blossom strikes target foe for +%s0..%s15 damage and all adjacent foes take %s0..%s15 damage.

cd: Deals +%s0..%s15 damage. Inflicts Bleeding and Deep Wound conditions (%b0..%b15 seconds). *Must follow an off-hand attack.*
d: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Twisting Fangs strikes for +%s0..%s15 damage and struck foe suffers from Bleeding and Deep Wound for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: Deals +%s0..%s15 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is not adjacent to any of its allies. *Must follow an off-hand attack.*
d: Must follow an off-hand attack. If it hits, Horns of the Ox strikes for +%s0..%s15 damage. If struck foe is not adjacent to any allies, that foe is knocked down.

cd: Deals +%s0..%s15 damage. Inflicts Poisoned condition (%b0..%b15 seconds). *No effect unless target foe is knocked-down.*
d: Must strike a knocked-down foe. If it hits, Falling Spider strikes for +%s0..%s15 damage and target foe is Poisoned for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: Deals +%s0..%s15 damage. You gain %b0..%b15 Energy if target foe is hexed.
d: If it hits, Black Lotus Strike strikes for +%s0..%s15 damage. If target foe is suffering from a hex, you gain  %b0..%b15 Energy.

cd: Deals +%s0..%s15 damage. Unblockable. *Must follow a lead attack.*
d: Must follow a lead attack. Fox Fangs cannot be blocked and strikes for +%s0..%s15 damage if it hits.

cd: Deals +%s0..%s15 damage. Recharges all your other attack skills if target foe's Health is below 50%. *Must follow a dual attack.*
d: Must follow a Dual Attack. If it hits, Moebius Strike strikes for +%s0..%s15 damage. If you strike a foe whose Health is below 50%, all your other attack skills are recharged.

cd: Inflicts Bleeding condition (%s0..%s15 seconds).
d: If Jagged Strike hits, your target suffers from Bleeding for %s0..%s15 seconds.

cd: Deals +%s0..%s15 damage. Deals %b0..%b15 more damage if target foe's Health is above 90%.
d: If this attack hits, you strike for +%s0..%s15 damage. If your target was above 90% Health you deal an additional %b0..%b15 damage.

cd: Causes knock-down. Inflicts Poisoned condition (%s0..%s15 seconds). *Must follow a lead attack.*
d: Entangling Asp must follow a lead attack. Target foe is knocked down and becomes Poisoned for %s0..%s15 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe receives 33% less from healing.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe gains 33% less benefit from healing.

cd: Deals %s0..%s15 damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is hexed or has a condition. Counts as a lead attack.
d: Target touched foe suffers %s0..%s15 damage, and if that foe is suffering from a hex or condition that foe is knocked down. Iron Palm counts as a lead attack.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) +%s0..%s15 Health regeneration and +24 armor. *No effect unless target ally is hexed or has a condition.*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target ally has a Resilient Weapon. While suffering from a hex or condition, that ally gains +%s0..%s15 Health regeneration and +24 armor.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Drop effect: inflicts Blindness condition (%s0..%s15 seconds) on all nearby foes.
d: Hold Mingson's ashes for up to %d0..%d15 seconds. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are Blinded for %s0..%s15 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Drop effect: deals %s0..%s15 damage and knocks-down all nearby foes.
d: Hold Kuurong's ashes for up to %d0..%d15 seconds. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are struck for %s0..%s15 damage and knocked down.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You steal %s0..%s15 Health from every foe that hits you with an attack.
d: Hold Khanhei's ashes for %d0..%d15 seconds. Whenever a foe strikes you in combat while you are holding Khanhei's ashes, you steal %s0..%s15 Health from that foe.

cd: Resurrects target party member (half your current Health and %s0..%s15% Energy). *Lose half your Health.*
d: Lose half your Health. Resurrect target party member with your current Health and %s0..%s15% Energy.

cd: (20 seconds.) Attacks deal %s0..%s15 damage to 3 adjacent foes. *Ends after %b0..%b15 attacks.*
d: For 20 seconds, target ally has a Splinter Weapon. Target ally's next %b0..%b15 attacks deal %s0..%s15 damage to up to 4 adjacent foes.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) +%b0..%b15 Health regeneration. 50% chance to block.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target ally has a Weapon of Warding, granting that ally +%b0..%b15 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Attacks interrupt attacking foes.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target ally has a Wailing Weapon. Whenever the Wailing Weapon strikes an attacking foe, that foe is interrupted.

cd: (12 seconds.) Target ally's attacks steal %s0..%s15 Health but deal %s0..%s15 less damage. *Ends after 3 attacks.*
d: For 12 seconds, target ally has a Nightmare Weapon. Target ally's next 3 attacks are reduced by %s0..%s15 damage and steal up to %s0..%s15 Health.

cd: Damages creatures in range.
d: Damages creatures in range.

cd: Damages creatures in range.
d: Damages creatures in range.

d: Blast Furnace

cd: You Shadow Step to this foe. Inflicts Dazed condition (%d0..%d15 seconds).
d: Shadow Step to target foe. That foe becomes Dazed for %s0..%s15 seconds.

cd: (5 seconds.) Causes -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration. Renewal: if target foe is moving when this hex ends.
d: For 5 seconds, target foe suffers -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration. If that foe is moving when Enduring Toxin would end, Enduring Toxin is renewed for another 5 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe cannot cast spells. *Your spells are disabled for 15 seconds.*
d: All of your spells are disabled for 15 seconds. For %d0..%d15 seconds, target touched foe cannot cast spells.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe cannot block your attacks.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe cannot block your attacks.

cd: Interrupt a spell or a chant. Interruption effect: steal %s0..%s15 Energy whenever target foe casts a spell (10 seconds).
d: If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and for 10 seconds, whenever that foe casts a spell, you steal up to %s0..%s15 Energy from that foe.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe's spells cause 10 Overcast.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, all spells cast by the target foe cause 10 Overcast.

cd: Creates a level %s0..%s15 vampiric horror. You gain Health equal to the damage it deals. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level %s0..%s15 Vampiric Horror. Whenever a Vampiric Horror you control deals damage, you gain the same amount of Health.

cd: (5 seconds plus 3 seconds more for every rank of Soul Reaping.) Your Necromancer spells cost %s0..%s15 less Energy. *You suffer from Bleeding (10 seconds) each time you cast a Necromancer spell.*
d: For 5 seconds and 3 seconds longer for every rank of Soul Reaping, your Necromancer spells cost -%s0..%s15 Energy to cast, but you suffer from Bleeding for 10 seconds each time you cast a Necromancer spell.

cd: For 10 seconds, you gain %s0..%s15 Health whenever a creature dies.
d: For 10 seconds, you gain %s0..%s15 Health whenever a creature dies.

cd: (30 seconds.) Causes -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration. You gain %b0..%b15 Energy if target foe dies while suffering from this hex.
d: For 30 seconds, target foe suffers -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration. If that foe dies while hexed with Reaper's Mark, you gain %b0..%b15 Energy.

cd: (3 seconds.) Initial effect: deals %s0..%s15 cold damage. End effect: deals %b0..%b15 cold damage to target and all nearby foes.
d: Target foe is struck for %s0..%s15 cold damage and is hexed with Shatterstone for 3 seconds. When Shatterstone ends, that foe and all nearby foes are struck for %b0..%b15 cold damage.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Allies adjacent to you have 75% chance to block. *Ends if you move.*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, allies adjacent to you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Protector's Defense ends if you move.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You and your pet move 25% faster.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, you and your pet run 25% faster.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. Drop effect: steal %b0..%b15 Health from nearby foes.
d: Hold Xinrae's ashes for up to %d0..%d15 seconds. While you hold her ashes, you cannot lose more than 20% of your max Health from a single hit. When you drop her ashes, you steal %b0..%b15 Health from all nearby foes.

cd: (10 seconds.) You have +%s0..%s15 Energy regeneration. Renewal: every time you cast a spell on an enemy.
d: For 10 seconds, you have +%s0..%s15 Energy regeneration. This enchantment reapplies itself every time you cast a spell on a foe.

cd: (6 seconds.) You have +%b0..%b15 Health regeneration. End effect: heals you for %s0..%s15 if you are attacking.
d: For 6 seconds, you gain %b0..%b15 Health regeneration. When Shadow Refuge ends, you gain %s0..%s15 Health if you are attacking.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Shadow Step to target foe and cause knock-down the next time this foe is more than 100' away from you.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, the next time you and target foe are more than 100' apart, you Shadow Step to that foe and that foe is knocked down. This spell has half the normal range.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You enter any stance used by target foe.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever target foe enters a stance, you enter the same stance.

cd: Deals %s0..%s15 damage. *No effect unless target foe has a condition and is either hexed or enchanted.*
d: If target foe is suffering from a condition and under the effects of a hex or an enchantment, that foe suffers %s0..%s15 damage.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Foes in this well have -1 Energy degeneration. *Exploits a fresh corpse.*
d: Exploit target corpse to create a Well of Weariness for %d0..%d15 seconds. Enemies within the Well of Weariness suffer -1 Energy degeneration.

cd: Steal %s0..%s15 Health from target foe. You have +%b0..%b15 Health regeneration (10 seconds).
d: Steal up to %s0..%s15 Health from target foe. For 10 seconds, you have +%b0..%b15 Health regeneration.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Causes %s0..%s15 Energy loss whenever target foe casts a spell. One foe near your target also loses Energy.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe and one nearby foe lose %s0..%s15 Energy.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Deals %b0..%b15 cold damage to nearby foes if target foe dies. Initial effect: deals %s0..%s15 cold damage.
d: Target foe is struck for %s0..%s15 cold damage. For %d0..%d15 seconds, if target foe dies all nearby foes are struck for %b0..%b15 cold damage.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe has -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration and takes %b0..%b15 damage while moving.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe suffers -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration and takes %b0..%b15 damage while moving.

cd: (7 seconds.) You move %s0..%s15% faster. *You suffer from Burning (7 seconds).* End effect: inflicts Burning condition (%b0..%b15 seconds) on adjacent foes.
d: For 7 seconds, you are set on fire and move %s0..%s15% faster. When Burning Speed ends, all adjacent foes are set on fire for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: Projectile: deals %s0..%s15 fire damage. Bonus effect: sends projectiles at 2 other foes near your target.
d: Lava Arrows fly toward up to 3 foes near your target and strike for %s0..%s15 fire damage if they hit.

cd: Deals %s0..%s15 fire damage each second (5 seconds) to location of target foe. Hits foes adjacent to your target. Inflicts Burning condition (%b0..%b15 seconds) on knocked down foes.
d: Create a Bed of Coals at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to target foe are struck for %s0..%s15 fire damage each second. Any foe knocked down on the Bed of Coals is set on fire for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Enemy spells cannot target you. Gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. *You cannot deal more than %s0..%s15 damage with a single skill or attack.*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, you cannot be the target of enemy spells, and you gain 5 damage reduction for each Assassin enchantment on you. You cannot deal more than %s0..%s15 damage with a single skill or attack.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target foe deals -%s0..%s15 attack damage. You have +33% chance to land a critical hit on this foe.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target foe deals -%s0..%s15 damage with attacks and all of your attacks against that foe have an additional 33% chance of being a critical hit.

cd: Causes -%b0..%b15 Health degeneration (10 seconds). Initial effect: deals %s0..%s15 cold damage. *Hex is only applied if target foe has a condition.*
d: Target foe is struck for %s0..%s15 cold damage. If suffering from a condition, that foe is hexed with Vile Miasma and suffers -%b0..%b15 Health degeneration for 10 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Your undead servants have +10 Health regeneration. *End effect: all of your servants die.*
d: Sacrifice 33% Health. For %d0..%d15 seconds, your minions have +10 Health regeneration. When Verata's Promise ends, all your minions die.

cd: Deals %s0..%s15 holy damage and inflicts Burning (%b0..%b15 seconds) every second (5 seconds). Hits foes adjacent to target's initial location.
d: Invoke a Ray of Judgment at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for %s0..%s15 holy damage and begin Burning for %b0..%b15 seconds every second.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You attack 33% faster and move 25% faster. *You take double damage.*

cd: If you are not within Earshot of an ally, you deal 10% additional damage, and take 10% more damage.

d: If you are Adjacent to an ally, your melee attacks have 15% armor penetration, and you have an additional +5% armor.

d: You take an additional 10% damage while moving.

d: All nearby foes begin Bleeding for %b0..%b15 seconds. For 30 seconds, this enchantment does nothing. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are Crippled for %s0..%s15 seconds.

d: All nearby foes are struck for %s0..%s15 earth damage. For 30 seconds, your attacks deal earth damage. When this enchantment ends, all nearby foes are Blinded for %b0..%b15 seconds.

cd: For each ally in the area, you cannot take more than 20 damage per second.
d: For each ally in the area, you cannot take more than 20 damage per second.

cd: You deal +30% damage to foes of the same primary profession. Each time you kill one of these foes, you regain all Health and Energy and receive a 5% morale boost.
d: You deal an additional 30% damage to foes of the same primary profession. Killing a foe of the same primary profession restores all your Health and Energy, and you get a 5% morale boost.

cd: You gain a morale boost from killing a foe. Your team receives a 5% Death Penalty when an ally dies.
d: You gain a morale boost from killing a foe. Your team receives a 5% Death Penalty when an ally dies.

cd: Whenever you die, all allies within earshot deal 20% more damage (maximum of 0) for 5 seconds.
d: Whenever you die, all allies within earshot deal 20% more damage (maximum of 0) for 5 seconds.

cd: Death Penalty begins at 0 and increases by 2% for every minute of the battle. (Maximum 60)
d: Death Penalty begins at 0 and increases by 2% for every minute of the battle. (Maximum 60)

cd: Your attack speed and movement speed are increased by 20% while your Health is below 20%.
d: Your attack speed and movement speed are increased by 20% while your Health is below 20%.

cd: You gain 5% Health per second while moving. This is reduced by 1% for each ally in earshot.
d: You gain 5% Health per second while moving. This is reduced by 1% for each ally in earshot.

cd: You deal an additional 25% damage, and resurrection skills activate 50% faster.
d: You deal an additional 25% damage, and resurrection skills activate 50% faster.

cd: Healing spells now heal you for an additional 10%. This effect is reduced by 2% for each ally in earshot.
d: Healing spells now heal you for an additional 10%. This effect is reduced by 2% for each ally in earshot.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You attack and gain adrenaline 25% faster.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, you attack and gain adrenaline 25% faster.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You attack 25% faster.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

cd: Inflicts Bleeding condition (%s0..%s15 seconds). Removes 1 Dervish enchantment. Removal effect: inflicts Deep Wound condition (%s0..%s15 seconds).
d: If this attack hits, target foe suffers from Bleeding for %s0..%s15 seconds, and you lose 1 Dervish enchantment. If an enchantment was removed, target foe also suffers from a Deep Wound for %s0..%s15 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.)You attack 25% faster and remove 1 of your Dervish enchantments. Removal effect: this stance lasts twice as long.
d: Remove 1 Dervish enchantment. For %d0..%d15 seconds, you attack 25% faster. If an enchantment was removed, this stance lasts twice as long.

cd: Ain't no time like party time.
d: This is where the party's at.

cd: Target foe loses all Enchantments. All Adjacent Foes are Knocked Down and struck for 150 damage.
d: Removes all enchantments from target foe. All adjacent foes are knocked down and struck for 150 damage.

cd: Target an illusory image and destroy it. All foes in the area of the destroyed illusory image receive 0 damage, and are Dazed for 0 seconds.
d: Target an illusory image and destroy it. All foes in the area of the destroyed illusory image receive 0 damage, and are Dazed for 0 seconds.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) You move 33% faster. *End effect: you are Crippled (3 seconds).*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.

cd: (8 seconds.) Causes -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration and target foe takes %s0..%s15 damage each second. End effect: that foe is healed for %b0..%b15. *Ends if reapplied.*
d: For 8 seconds, target foe has -%s0..%s15 Health degeneration and takes %s0..%s15 damage each second. When Illusion of Pain ends or is reapplied, that foe is healed for %b0..%b15.

cd: (60 seconds.) You gain %b0..%b15 Energy and are healed for %s0..%s15% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.
d: For 60 seconds, you gain %b0..%b15 Energy and are healed for %s0..%s15% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

cd: Change forms.
d: Change forms.

cd: You are controlling a golem from the future.
d: Your mind is controlling a golem across time. Don't think too hard about how that works.

cd: (20 seconds.) A shield around the golem prevents up to 250 damage to nearby allies. Removes Spectral Agony from shielded targets.
d: A shield surrounds the golem for 20 seconds, preventing up to 250 damage to nearby allies. Removes Spectral Agony from shielded targets.

cd: Removes a condition. Deals 150 damage to adjacent foes and sets them on fire (3 seconds). Interrupts struck foes.
d: Overload your reactor, removing a condition from yourself and dealing 150 damage to all adjacent foes. Foes struck by Reactor Burst are interrupted and set on fire for 3 seconds.

cd: (10 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage you take. Negation effect: you gain 500 Health.
d: For 10 seconds, the next time you would take fatal damage, that damage is negated and you gain 500 Health.

cd: Steal 75 Health. If you strike Sarah, steal twice as much Health.
d: If this attack hits, it steals 75 Health. Steals twice as much Health if it strikes Sarah.

cd: Deals 300 damage to all targets in a line.
d: Send out a beam that strikes all targets in a line for 300 damage.

cd: Deals +80 damage to target and adjacent foes.
d: Strikes target and adjacent foes for +80 damage.

cd: Throw target into lava. *Only works near very hot lava.*
d: Throw target touched foe into lava. Only works near a suitably hot lava pit.

cd: (10 seconds.) Initial effect: interrupts a skill. End effect: interrupts a skill.
d: Interrupt target foe. For 10 seconds, target foe is hexed with Web of Disruption. When this hex ends, that foe is interrupted again.

cd: Gain a stacking 5% damage bonus (max 30%) whenever you use a skill of a different attribute than the last skill used. Bonus resets if your next skill has the same attribute.
d: Whenever you use a skill with a different attribute than the last skill you used, you gain a 5% stacking damage bonus (maximum 30%). This bonus resets if you use a skill with the same attribute as the last skill you used.

cd: If all your skills use one attribute, gain +3 Health regeneration and +100 max Health; your skills also cost 25% less Energy.
d: If all the skills on your bar use the same attribute, you gain +3 Health regeneration and +100 maximum Health, and your skills cost 25% less Energy.

cd: If your attributes are all between 8-11 before buffs, your skills deal 15% additional damage, activate 25% faster, and cost 20% less Energy.
d: If all of your attribute lines are between 8-11 ranks, not counting buffs, then your skills deal 15% additional damage, activate 25% faster, and cost 20% less Energy to activate.

cd: Your secondary profession skills deal 30% more damage to foes with that primary profession.
d: Skills from your secondary profession deal 30% more damage to foes with that primary profession.

cd: PvP combat is unmodified.
d: "The natural state of a phenomenon is often the most revealing." - Lord Odran (PvP combat is unmodified.)

cd: Kill the boss (or any player if there is no boss); now you're the boss: -20 armor, +33% attack speed, +33% movement speed, -33% skill activation time, +3 Health regeneration, and +1 Energy regeneration. If you die, you're not the boss anymore. If a player killed you, they're the boss now.
d: If no one is the boss, killing another player makes you the boss, giving you -20 armor but the following bonuses: +33% attack speed, +33% movement speed, -33% skill activation time, +3 Health regeneration, and +1 Energy regeneration. If you die, you stop being the boss. If another player killed you, they become the boss.

cd: You have -20 armor, +33% attack speed, +33% movement speed, -33% skill activation time, +3 Health regeneration, and +1 Energy regeneration. Lose this buff when you die.
d: You're the boss! You have -20 armor, +33% attack speed, +33% movement speed, -33% skill activation time, +3 Health regeneration, and +1 Energy regeneration. You lose this buff when you die.

cd: Deals %s0..%s15 lightning damage. 25% armor penetration.

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Inflicts Burning condition (%s0..%s15 seconds) whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a target.
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, whenever you apply an Elemental hex to a foe, that foe is set on fire for %s0..%s15 seconds.

cd: Causes knock-down if this foe is Blind or moving. *50% failure chance unless Water Magic 5 or higher.*

d: While you maintain this enchantment, your spells cast %s0..%s15% faster and recharge %b0..%b15% faster, but you continuously gain Overcast. *PvE Skill*

d: Shadow Step to target foe. For %d0..%d15 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by %s0..%s15 and your attributes are increased by %b0..%b15. This skill counts as a Lead Attack. *PvE Skill*

d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, each non-spirit ally in earshot gains the effect of a random Weapon Spell. *PvE Skill*

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Gain +%s0..%s15 energy regeneration. Renewal: whenever you use a non-Dervish skill. *PvE Skill*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, you have +%s0..%s15 energy regeneration. This skill reapplies itself every time you use a non-Dervish skill. *PvE Skill*

cd: (%d0..%d15 seconds.) Target ally gains +%s0..%s15 to all attributes. Renewal: every time a chant or shout ends on this ally. *Cannot target spirits. PvE Skill*
d: For %d0..%d15 seconds, target non-spirit ally gains +%s0..%s15 to all attributes. This echo is reapplied every time a chant or shout ends on that ally. *PvE Skill*
